actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security

official_title: To amend section 302 of the PROTECT Act to modify the standards for the issuance of alerts through the AMBER Alert communications network.
short_title: Tory Jo's Loophole AMBER Response Act

summary.text: Tory Jo's Loophole AMBER Response Act - Amends the PROTECT Act to: (1) require the minimum standards for the issuance and dissemination of alerts through the AMBER Alert communications network to allow local law enforcement officials to issue and provide for the dissemination of an alert to facilitate the recovery of an abducted newborn; and (2) define "child" to mean an individual under age 18 or a newborn.

titles.title: Tory Jo's Loophole AMBER Response Act
To amend section 302 of the PROTECT Act to modify the standards for the issuance of alerts through the AMBER Alert communications network.
